item.title: FHLBank Chicago Announces 2024 Director Election Results
item.description: CHICAGO--(BUSINESS WIRE)--The Federal Home Loan Bank of Chicago (FHLBank Chicago) is pleased to announce the results of its 2024 Director Election.

item.title: Samenvatting: Newmont en MKS PAMP werken samen om goudstaven traceerbaar van de mijn tot op de markt te lanceren bij de grootste groothandelaar van de V.S.
item.description: DENVER--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Newmont Corporation (NYSE: NEM, TSX: NGT, ASX: NEM, PNGX: NEM) en MKS PAMP werken samen om consumenten een traceerbare goudstaaf aan te bieden die exclusief is gemaakt met in Newmont gedolven goud, geraffineerd en geslagen door MKS PAMP in Zwitserland – mogelijk gemaakt door Provenance™. De PAMP 1oz Lady of Liberty goudstaaf, traceerbaar van de mijn tot op de markt, is verkrijgbaar bij de grootste groothandelaar van de V.S. Hiermee wordt goud bezitten een toegankelijke

item.title: Riassunto: Newmont e MKS PAMP collaborano per lanciare un lingotto d'oro tracciabile dalla miniera al mercato al più grande grossista degli Stati Uniti
item.description: DENVER--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Newmont Corporation (NYSE: NEM, TSX: NGT, ASX: NEM, PNGX: NEM) e MKS PAMP collaborano per offrire ai consumatori un lingotto d'oro tracciabile realizzato esclusivamente con oro ricavato dalla miniera di Newmont, raffinato e coniato da MKS PAMP in Svizzera – alimentato da Provenance™. Il lingotto d'oro da 1 oncia tracciabile dalla miniera al mercato PAMP Lady of Liberty è disponibile presso il maggiore grossista degli Stati Uniti, rendendo così il possesso di oro un'opzi

item.title: Newmont y MKS PAMP se asocian para lanzar el lingote de oro trazable de mina a mercado en el mayor mayorista de EE. UU.
item.description: DENVER--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Newmont Corporation (NYSE: NEM, TSX: NGT, ASX: NEM, PNGX: NEM) y MKS PAMP se asocian para ofrecer a los consumidores una barra de oro trazable hecha exclusivamente con oro minado por Newmont, refinado y acuñado por MKS PAMP en Suiza, impulsado por Provenance™. La barra de oro trazable de 1 oz Lady of Liberty de PAMP de la mina al mercado está disponible en el mayor mayorista de Estados Unidos, haciendo que poseer oro sea una opción accesible para la construcción de riqu

item.title: Newmont et MKS PAMP s'associent pour lancer des lingots d'or traçables de la mine au marché chez le plus grand grossiste des États-Unis
item.description: DENVER--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Newmont Corporation (NYSE : NEM, TSX : NGT, ASX : NEM, PNGX : NEM) et MKS PAMP s’associent pour offrir aux consommateurs un lingot d'or traçable fabriquée exclusivement avec de l'or extrait par Newmont, raffiné et frappé par MKS PAMP en Suisse – optimisé par Provenance™. Lady of Liberty, la barre d'or PAMP de 1 oz , est traçable de la mine au marché et est disponible chez le plus grand grossiste américain, ce qui fait de la possession d'or une option intéressante pour l

item.title: ニューモントとMKS PAMPが提携し、鉱山から市場まで追跡可能なゴールド・バーを米国最大の卸売販売業者でローンチ
item.description: デンバー--(BUSINESS WIRE)--（ビジネスワイヤ） -- ニューモント・コーポレーション（NYSE: NEM、TSX: NGT、ASX: NEM、PNGX: NEM）とMKS PAMPが提携し、追跡可能なゴールド・バーを消費者に独占提供します。ニューモントが採掘した金を原材料とするこのゴールド・バーは、MKS PAMPがProvenance™を活用し、スイスで精製・鋳造したものです。この鉱山から市場まで追跡可能な1オンス・ゴールド・バーであるPAMPのレディー・オブ・リバティは、米国最大の卸売販売業者で購入できるため、金の所有が蓄財に向けた手頃な選択肢になります。 「ニューモントの金を手頃な価格で消費者に直接お届けできる今回の機会は、追い求め、そして所有する価値のある重要な商品としての金を宣伝する当社の献身的な取り組みが実を結んだものです。持続可能な採掘業務と原材料調達の透明性に対する当社の取り組みは、生活必需品を購入しながらでさえ、金の購入を消費者にとって実現できる選択肢にします」と、ニューモント最高開発責任者ピーター・トスは述べます。 追跡可能な1オンス・ゴールド・

item.title: Newmont e MKS PAMP fazem parceria para lançar barras de ouro rastreáveis da mina ao mercado no maior atacadista dos EUA
item.description: DENVER--(BUSINESS WIRE)--A Newmont Corporation (NYSE: NEM, TSX: NGT, ASX: NEM, PNGX: NEM) e a MKS PAMP firmaram uma parceria para oferecer aos consumidores uma barra de ouro rastreável feita exclusivamente com ouro extraído da mina da Newmont, refinado e cunhado pela MKS PAMP na Suíça – com a tecnologia Provenance™. A barra de ouro rastreável PAMP de 1 onça da Lady of Liberty está disponível no maior atacadista dos EUA, tornando a posse de ouro uma opção acessível para a construção de riqueza.

item.title: Newmont与MKS PAMP合作，通过美国最大的批发商发行从矿山到市场的可追溯金条
item.description: 丹佛--(BUSINESS WIRE)--(美国商业资讯)-- Newmont Corporation (NYSE: NEM, TSX: NGT, ASX: NEM, PNGX: NEM) 与MKS PAMP合作，向消费者推出可追溯金条，该产品完全由Newmont开采的黄金制成，并由MKS PAMP在瑞士以Provenance ™精炼和铸造。从矿山到市场的可追溯PAMP一盎司自由女神金条通过美国最大的批发商发售，让拥有黄金成为一种可行的财富积累方式。 Newmont首席开发官Peter Toth表示：“Newmont黄金有机会直接面向消费者，证明了我们将黄金推广成为值得追求和拥有的珍贵商品的承诺。我们对可持续采矿和来源透明度的坚持让消费者能够像购买生活用品那样买到黄金。” 可追溯的一盎司自由女神金条采用了成熟的Provenance™解决方案，为消费者提供了更可靠的黄金来源保证。该解决方案由MKS PAMP首创，经过独立审计和认证，确保黄金在整个精炼和铸造过程中完全隔离，保证了黄金的透明度和完全可追溯性。 MKS PAMP铸造部全球主管Chris Carkner表示：“我们在这个项目上的

item.title: Newmont與MKS PAMP合作，透過美國最大的批發商發行從礦場到市場的可追溯金條
item.description: 丹佛--(BUSINESS WIRE)--(美國商業資訊)-- Newmont Corporation (NYSE: NEM, TSX: NGT, ASX: NEM, PNGX: NEM) 與MKS PAMP合作，向消費者推出可追溯金條，該產品完全由Newmont開采的黃金製成，並由MKS PAMP在瑞士以Provenance ™精煉和鑄造。從礦場到市場的可追溯PAMP一盎司自由女神金條透過美國最大的批發商發售，讓擁有黃金成為可行的財富累積方式。 Newmont開發長Peter Toth表示：「Newmont黃金有機會直接面向消費者，證明了我們將黃金推廣成為值得追求和擁有的珍貴商品的承諾。我們對永續採礦和來源透明度的堅持讓消費者能夠像購買生活用品那樣買到黃金。」 可追溯的一盎司自由女神金條採用了成熟的Provenance™解決方案，為消費者提供了更可靠的黃金來源保證。該解決方案由MKS PAMP首創，經過獨立審計和認證，確保黃金在整個精煉和鑄造過程中完全隔離，保證了黃金的透明度和完全可追溯性。 MKS PAMP鑄造部全球主管Chris Carkner表示：「我們在這個專案上的合作是邁向

item.title: PursueCare Introduces RESET® and RESET-O®—FDA-Authorized Digital Therapeutics for Addiction Treatment
item.description: MIDDLETOWN, Conn.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--PursueCare, a leader in virtual addiction treatment, today announced the rollout of RESET® and RESET-O® , the only FDA-authorized prescription digital therapeutics (PDTs) for substance use disorder (SUD) and opioid use disorder (OUD). The groundbreaking app-based digital therapies deliver a self-guided 12-week course of cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT), in which patients are incentivized to complete lessons, adhere to treatment, and abstain from drug use. D

item.title: HES Promotes the Power of Kindness in the Workplace
item.description: MIDLAND, Mich.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Health Enhancement Systems (HES), leading provider of workplace wellness solutions, is advocating the positive effects of kindness, civility, and graciousness in the workplace. In Kindness and Well-Being Go Hand in Hand: From Sentiment to Science, HES demonstrates these acts boost physical, mental, and emotional well-being, while encouraging organizations to adopt these behaviors as key values. Dean Witherspoon, CEO of HES, underscores the importance of kindness

item.title: Report: Calendly’s State of Meetings 2024 shows workers want more meetings – as long as they’re good meetings
item.description: ATLANTA--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Calendly, the only centralized scheduling automation platform built for scaling across the organization, today released its second annual report, The State of Meetings. It uncovers how internal and external meetings shape productivity, decision-making, and collaboration across industries, roles and generations, and outlines strategies for making meetings more effective in today’s hybrid work environment. Surprisingly, 81% of respondents think more (productive) meetings

item.title: Tekmetric and Shopgenie Unite to Revolutionize Auto Repair Shop Management
item.description: HOUSTON--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Tekmetric, the leading cloud-based shop management system for auto repair shops, is joining forces with Shopgenie, the leading auto repair shop CRM.

item.title: Accenture Life Trends 2025 Predicts New Dynamics of Trust Will Reshape Relationships Between People and Businesses
item.description: NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Over half of people are questioning the content they’re served online more than before, according to Accenture’s annual Life Trends report.

item.title: Newmont und MKS PAMP bringen gemeinsam rückverfolgbaren Mine-to-Market-Goldbarren beim größten US-Großhändler auf den Markt
item.description: DENVER--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Newmont Corporation (NYSE: NEM, TSX: NGT, ASX: NEM, PNGX: NEM) und MKS PAMP bieten gemeinsam einen rückverfolgbaren Goldbarren an, der ausschließlich aus von Newmont abgebautem Gold besteht und von MKS PAMP in der Schweiz raffiniert und geprägt wird – powered by Provenance™. Der rückverfolgbare Mine-to-Market 1 oz Goldbarren „Lady of Liberty“ von PAMP ist beim größten US-Großhändler erhältlich und macht den Besitz von Gold zu einer erschwinglichen Option für den Vermöge

item.title: Abu Dhabi se prepara para 2ª temporada da Autonomous Racing League, com novas equipes, um modelo aprimorado da Autonomous Super Formula e uma premiação de US$ 2,25 milhões
item.description: DUBAI, Emirados Árabes Unidos--(BUSINESS WIRE)--A ASPIRE, braço de aceleração de inovação do Conselho de Pesquisa em Tecnologia Avançada de Abu Dhabi (ATRC), lançou oficialmente a segunda temporada da Abu Dhabi Autonomous Racing League (A2RL), com corrida confirmada em 26 de abril de 2025, no Circuito Yas Marina. A A2RL retorna com uma presença global ainda maior, atraindo quatro novas equipes internacionais e revelando o modelo aprimorado da Super Formula Emirates Autonomous Vehicle (EAV24), d

item.title: アブダビ、自律走行レーシングリーグのシーズン2に向けて準備：225万米ドルの賞金総額を用意し、新型自律スーパーフォーミュラモデル、新チームで再始動
item.description: アラブ首長国連邦・ドバイ--(BUSINESS WIRE)--（ビジネスワイヤ） -- アブダビ先端技術研究評議会（ATRC）のイノベーション促進部門であるASPIREは、アブダビ自律走行レーシングリーグ（A2RL）のシーズン2の開催を正式に発表しました。レースの日程は2025年4月26日に決定し、ヤス・マリーナ・サーキットを会場として行われます。A2RLは、世界各地から新たに4チームが加わり、モータースポーツにおけるAIの限界に挑むべく設計されたアップグレード版ダラーラ製スーパーフォーミュラ・エミレーツ・オートノマス・ビークル（EAV24）の公開とともに、さらに幅広いグローバルなフットプリントを確立しました。出場者は、驚愕の総額225万米ドルの賞金をめぐってレースを展開します。 2024年4月に開催された初レースは、米国、ドイツ、スイス、ハンガリー、イタリア、シンガポール、中国、アラブ首長国連邦（UAE）のチームが参加し、成功を収めました。今回、A2RLは新たに次の4チーム：米国のAiPEX Racing、フランスのAladin Innovation、日本のSEVRUS Japan

item.title: 阿布達比為自動駕駛賽車聯賽的第二賽季整裝待發：攜新車隊、升級後的自動駕駛超級方程式賽車和225萬美元的獎金池重磅回歸
item.description: 阿聯杜拜--(BUSINESS WIRE)--(美國商業資訊)-- 阿布達比先進技術研究委員會(ATRC)的創新加速部門ASPIRE已正式啟動阿布達比自動駕駛賽車聯賽(A2RL)的第二賽季，比賽日已確認於2025年4月26日在亞斯碼頭賽道舉行。回歸的A2RL新增了四支國際車隊，將吸引更廣泛的全球受眾，並展示升級後的由Dallara製造的超級方程式阿聯自動駕駛汽車(EAV24)，旨在突破賽車運動中AI應用的界限。參賽者將爭奪總額高達225萬美元的獎金。 繼2024年4月成功舉辦有來自美國、德國、瑞士、匈牙利、義大利、新加坡、中國和阿聯的車隊參加的首屆賽事後，A2RL將擴大其全球參賽陣容，新增四支車隊，分別為來自美國的AiPEX Racing、 來自法國的Aladin Innovation、來自日本的SEVRUS Japan (TGM Grand Prix)和來自阿聯技術創新研究所(TII)的一支車隊。這些新參賽者將加入第一賽季原班車隊的行列，在11月進行嚴格的模擬測試，屆時他們將直面各種賽道條件以最終確定完整的車隊名單。第二賽季的比賽形式將在模擬挑戰賽後揭曉。 在模擬階段，車隊將證明他們

item.title: 阿布扎比为自动驾驶赛车联赛的第二赛季整装待发：携新车队、升级后的自动驾驶超级方程式赛车和225万美元的奖金池重磅回归
item.description: 阿联酋迪拜--(BUSINESS WIRE)--(美国商业资讯)-- 阿布扎比先进技术研究委员会(ATRC)的创新加速部门ASPIRE已正式启动阿布扎比自动驾驶赛车联赛(A2RL)的第二赛季，比赛日已确认于2025年4月26日在亚斯码头赛道举行。回归的A2RL新增了四支国际车队，将吸引更广泛的全球受众，并展示升级后的由Dallara制造的超级方程式阿联酋自动驾驶汽车(EAV24)，旨在突破赛车运动中AI应用的界限。参赛者将争夺总额高达225万美元的奖金。 继2024年4月成功举办有来自美国、德国、瑞士、匈牙利、意大利、新加坡、中国和阿联酋的车队参加的首届赛事后，A2RL将扩大其全球参赛阵容，新增四支车队，分别为来自美国的AiPEX Racing、 来自法国的Aladin Innovation、来自日本的SEVRUS Japan (TGM Grand Prix)和来自阿联酋技术创新研究所(TII)的一支车队。这些新参赛者将加入第一赛季原班车队的行列，在11月进行严格的模拟测试，届时他们将直面各种赛道条件以最终确定完整的车队名单。第二赛季的比赛形式将在模拟挑战赛后揭晓。 在模拟阶段，车队将

item.title: Abu Zabi gotowe na 2. sezon Ligi Wyścigowych Samochodów Autonomicznych: powrót z nowymi drużynami, udoskonalonym modelem pojazdu autonomicznego Super Formula i pulą nagród o wartości 2,25 mln USD
item.description: DUBAJ, Zjednoczone Emiraty Arabskie--(BUSINESS WIRE)--ASPIRE, filia Rady ds. Zaawansowanych Badań Technologicznych w Abu Zabi (ATRC) ukierunkowana na przyspieszenie innowacji, oficjalnie zainaugurowała drugi sezon Ligi Wyścigowych Samochodów Autonomicznych w Abu Zabi (A2RL), potwierdzając datę wyścigu – 26 kwietnia 2025 r., oraz jego miejsce – tor wyścigowy Yas Marina Circuit. A2RL powraca, ciesząc się jeszcze większym zainteresowaniem na całym świecie – do ligi dołączają cztery nowe międzynaro

item.title: Abu Dhabi si prepara per la seconda stagione dell'Autonomous Racing League: torna con nuovi team, un modello a guida autonoma Super Formula migliorato e un montepremi da 2,25 milioni di dollari
item.description: DUBAI, Emirati Arabi Uniti--(BUSINESS WIRE)--ASPIRE, il ramo dedicato all'accelerazione dell'innovazione dell'Advanced Technology Research Council (ATRC) di Abu Dhabi, ha presentato ufficialmente la seconda stagione dell'Abu Dhabi Autonomous Racing League (A2RL), con la giornata delle corse confermata per il 26 aprile 2025 presso il circuito di Yas Marina. Si tratta di un nuovo appuntamento con l'A2RL, che richiama un pubblico ancora più vasto con l'aggiunta di quattro nuovi team internazionali

item.title: Abu Dhabi maakt zich op voor tweede seizoen van de Autonomous Racing League die terugkeert met nieuwe teams, geüpgraded Autonomous Super Formula-model en een prijzenpot van US$ 2,25 miljoen
item.description: DUBAI, Verenigde Arabische Emiraten--(BUSINESS WIRE)--ASPIRE, de innovatieversnellingstak van de Advanced Technology Research Council (ATRC) van Abu Dhabi, heeft officieel het tweede seizoen van de Abu Dhabi Autonomous Racing League (A2RL) gelanceerd, met een bevestigde racedag gepland voor 26 april 2025 op het Yas Marina Circuit. De A2RL keert terug en trekt een nog bredere wereldwijde aanwezigheid aan met de toevoeging van vier nieuwe internationale teams en de onthulling van een geüpgraded,

item.title: Abu Dhabi se prepara para la segunda temporada de la Liga de Carreras Autónomas: vuelve con nuevos equipos, un modelo mejorado de superfórmula autónoma y USD 2,25 millones en premios
item.description: DUBÁI, Emiratos Árabes Unidos--(BUSINESS WIRE)--ASPIRE, la rama de aceleración de la innovación del Consejo de Investigación de Tecnología Avanzada de Abu Dhabi (ATRC), lanzó oficialmente la segunda temporada de la Abu Dhabi Autonomous Racing League (A2RL), con un día de carrera confirmado fijado para el 26 de abril de 2025, en Yas Marina Circuit. La A2RL regresa con una presencia mundial aún más amplia, con la incorporación de cuatro nuevos equipos internacionales y la presentación de un vehíc

item.title: Abú Zabí se připravuje na 2. sezónu Ligy pro autonomní automobilové závody (Autonomous Racing League – A2RL): Vrací se s novými týmy, vylepšeným modelem autonomní superformule a výherním fondem ve výši 2,25 milionu USD.
item.description: DUBAJ, Spojené arabské emiráty--(BUSINESS WIRE)--ASPIRE, odnož Rady pro pokročilý technologický výzkum (ATRC) v Abú Zabí pro urychlení inovací, oficiálně zahájila 2. sezónu Ligy pro autonomní automobilové závody v Abu Zabí (A2RL), s potvrzeným dnem závodu stanoveným na 26. dubna 2025, na okruhu Yas Marina. A2RL se vrací a přitahuje ještě širší globální záběr díky přidání čtyř nových mezinárodních týmů a odhalení modernizované, na platformě Dallara postavené superformule „Super Formula Emirates

item.title: Abu Dhabi az Autonomous Racing League 2. szezonjára készül: új csapatokkal, továbbfejlesztett Autonomous Super Formula modellel és 2,25 millió dolláros nyereményalappal tér vissza
item.description: DUBAI, Egyesült Arab Emírségek--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Az ASPIRE, az Abu Dhabi Advanced Technology Research Council (ATRC) innovációs részlege hivatalosan is bejelentette az Abu Dhabi Autonomous Racing League (A2RL) második szezonját, amelynek megerősített versenynapjára 2025. április 26-án a Yas Marina Circuit pályán kerül majd sor. Az A2RL még szélesebb körű globális lábnyommal tér vissza négy új nemzetközi csapat hozzáadásával és egy továbbfejlesztett, a Dallara által épített Super Formula Emirate

item.title: Abu Dhabi se prépare pour la saison 2 de la Autonomous Racing League : De nouvelles équipes, un modèle de super formule autonome amélioré et un pot de prix de 2,25 millions de dollars américains
item.description: DUBAÏ, Émirats arabes unis--(BUSINESS WIRE)--ASPIRE, le bras de l'accélération de l'innovation du Conseil de recherche sur les technologies avancées (ATRC) d'Abu Dhabi, a officiellement lancé la deuxième saison de la Ligue de course autonome d'Abou Dhabi (A2RL), avec une journée de course confirmée fixée au 26 avril 2025, sur le circuit de Yas Marina. A2RL revient avec une empreinte mondiale encore plus large avec l'ajout de quatre nouvelles équipes internationales et le dévoilement d'un véhicu

item.title: Abu Dhabi bereitet sich auf die zweite Saison der Autonomous Racing League vor: Rückkehr mit neuen Teams, verbessertem Modell des autonomen Super-Formel-Rennwagens und einem Preispool von 2,25 Mio. USD
item.description: DUBAI, Vereinigte Arabische Emirate--(BUSINESS WIRE)--ASPIRE, der Innovationsbeschleuniger des Abu Dhabi Advanced Technology Research Council (ATRC), hat offiziell die zweite Saison der Abu Dhabi Autonomous Racing League (A2RL) gestartet. Der Renntag wurde für den 26. April 2025 auf dem Yas Marina Circuit bestätigt. A2RL kehrt mit vier neuen internationalen Teams und der Vorstellung eines verbesserten, von Dallara gebauten Super Formula Emirates Autonomous Vehicle (EAV24) zurück, das die Grenze

item.title: Get Joy and Renowned Longevity Expert Dan Buettner, Founder of Blue Zones, Present Aging on ‘Paws’: 10 Keys to Dog Longevity
item.description: NORWALK, Conn.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Get Joy and Dan Buettner partner to unveil Aging on 'Paws’ docuseries, revealing 10 keys to enhance dog longevity through nutrition and wellness.

item.title: Xtensible Solutions Joins SAM
item.description: AUSTIN, Texas--(BUSINESS WIRE)--SAM, the Managed Geospatial Services™ Company for utilities, transportation, and infrastructure-focused clients, today announced its acquisition of Xtensible Solutions, an innovative leader of semantic-based integration and information data management solutions to the utility industry worldwide. Semantic integration permits the sharing and interoperability of data and systems across different platforms, applications, and stakeholders so utilities can more easily

item.title: Amazon Ads Launches New AI Tools for Advertisers – AI Creative Studio and Audio Generator
item.description: AUSTIN, Texas--(BUSINESS WIRE)--(NASDAQ: AMZN) — At unBoxed 2024, Amazon Ads introduced AI creative studio and Audio generator, two new generative AI tools designed to lower creative barriers and expand opportunities for advertisers to scale their reach. By building a suite of self-service, AI-powered tools, Amazon Ads is enabling brands of all sizes to create engaging content across media types and eliminating boundaries across ad formats. With Audio generator, Amazon Ads expands its suite of

item.title: SGH Becomes Penguin Solutions
item.description: MILPITAS, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)---- $PENG #AI--SGH announced the completion of its brand transition from SMART Global Holdings, Inc. to Penguin Solutions, Inc., an infrastructure solution provider.

item.title: SoFi Partners with Venus Williams and Cameron Brink to Launch the ‘Give Her Credit’ Campaign in Honor of the 50th Anniversary of the Equal Credit Opportunity Act
item.description: SAN FRANCISCO--(BUSINESS WIRE)--In honor of the 50th anniversary of the Equal Credit Opportunity Act (ECOA), SoFi (NASDAQ: SOFI), the one-stop shop for digital personal financial services, has teamed up with tennis champion, entrepreneur and author Venus Williams and Los Angeles Sparks forward Cameron Brink to launch the Give Her Credit campaign. With this national initiative, SoFi will begin accepting submissions to award $500,000 to 50 people (each receiving $10,000) to help further advance w

item.title: Nu Skin Introduces MYND360™, a New Line of Clinically Proven Supplements and Topicals for Mental Well-Being
item.description: PROVO, Utah--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Nu Skin Enterprises (NYSE: NUS), a global beauty and wellness leader, today introduced MYND360, a new line of clinically proven nutritional formulas to support core needs for cognitive well-being. MYND360 is the culmination of five years of research and clinical studies, and features six products designed to help users sleep better, manage stress, stay focused and even support a strong memory. “Sleep, stress, memory and mental cognition all have a significant impac

item.title: Valeo Increases Truck Loading/Unloading Speed 6x with Slip Robotics
item.description: SEYMOUR, Ind.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Valeo, a global leader in automotive parts manufacturing, has optimized its dock operations by partnering with Slip Robotics. Through the deployment of SlipBot autonomous loading robots, Valeo has drastically reduced its truck loading and unloading times sixfold, setting a new standard for efficiency and safety in the automotive industry. In the fast-paced world of automotive manufacturing, staying ahead of industry demands is crucial. For Valeo optimizing intern

item.title: Newmont and MKS PAMP Partner to Launch Mine-to-Market Traceable Gold Bar at the Largest U.S. Wholesaler
item.description: DENVER--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- #Newmont--Newmont Corporation (NYSE: NEM, TSX: NGT, ASX: NEM, PNGX: NEM) and MKS PAMP partner to offer consumers a traceable gold bar exclusively made with Newmont-mined gold, refined and minted by MKS PAMP in Switzerland – powered by Provenance™. The mine-to-market traceable PAMP 1oz Lady of Liberty gold bar is available at the largest U.S. wholesaler, making owning gold an accessible option for wealth building. “The opportunity for Newmont gold to be accessible, direct to consu

item.title: e.l.f. Cosmetics Releases Full ‘Get Ready With Music, The Album,’ Giving a Megaphone to Emerging Artists
item.description: OAKLAND, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--e.l.f. Cosmetics, an e.l.f. Beauty (NYSE: ELF) brand, is proud to announce the full release of ‘Get Ready With Music, The Album,’ a collection of inspiring songs that bridge the worlds of beauty and music. item.description: LOS ANGELES--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- #MapQuest--MapQuest is back! MapQuest unveils Private Maps, a no-tracking, ad-free app built for privacy-focused navigation. Protect your data—download it now!

item.title: Swoop Launches Proprietary GenAI Platform with Custom Privacy-Safe AI Assistants to Transform Omnichannel Marketing for Pharma Brands
item.description: NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Swoop, the leader in privacy-safe healthcare marketing and data solutions, is proud to announce the launch of Swoop AI Assistants. This innovative suite of AI-powered tools enables pharma marketers to dynamically interact with their data and transform it into actionable insights that fuel omnichannel marketing strategies. item.title: Ridge Security Announces RidgeBot 5.0: A Major Leap Forward in AI-Powered Automated Penetration Testing
item.description: MILPITAS, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- #Autopentest--Ridge Security, a leader in AI-powered security validation, is thrilled to announce the release of RidgeBot® 5.0, a substantial upgrade to its automated penetration testing platform. This release introduces AI-driven Web API testing, expanded vulnerability management integrations, and an upgraded operating system, further solidifying RidgeBot®'s leadership in automated security testing. item.title: Adobe Launches Firefly Video Model and Enhances Image, Vector and Design Models

item.title: Limited Tickets Are Available for the 2024 Food Network New York City Wine & Food Festival presented by Invesco QQQ
item.description: NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- #NYCWFF--New York’s premier culinary event, The Food Network New York City Wine & Food Festival presented by Invesco QQQ (NYCWFF) is poised for a historic 17th year, making a notable transition to Brooklyn as its primary hub. From October 17-20, the Festival’s signature events and pier parties will take place at the Invesco QQQ Festival Campus at Brooklyn Army Terminal, reflecting its ongoing commitment to culinary excellence and community engagement. item.title: Veridas Increases Global Leadership in Facial Access Technology, Partnering with Soccerex at Inter Miami FC's Chase Stadium and Seminole Hard Rock Hotel and Casino, Hollywood
item.description: MIAMI--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Veridas, in an exclusive & global partnership with Soccerex, is redefining access control at the sport’s industry major events with its facial access technology. After a successful deployment at Soccerex in Amsterdam this past June, Veridas is again setting the standard for access at the upcoming events in Miami, including the Chase Stadium and Seminole Hard Rock Hotel and Casino, Hollywood. item.title: Vast Announces Haven-2, Its Proposed Space Station Designed To Succeed The International Space Station (ISS)
item.description: MILAN--(BUSINESS WIRE)--During the 75th International Astronautical Congress (IAC), Vast, the US-based space habitation technology company, unveiled Haven-2 — the proposed successor to the International Space Station (ISS) and the next step in the company’s vision to pioneer a path to long-term living and thriving in space. With the planned retirement of the International Space Station (ISS) by 2030, NASA conceived the Commercial LEO Destination (CLD) program and is expected to select its Phase

item.title: Aptelligence Secures OneStream’s Gold Partner Level Status

item.title: NFL Players Admit: Piles Almost Irresistible Thanks to Old Spice Total Body Deodorant
item.description: CINCINNATI--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Everything you think you know about what happens in an NFL pile? Toss it. Old Spice is cracking open one of football’s greatest mysteries by bringing together Kay Adams, Flavor Flav, and Spice Adams to reveal the secrets of staying fresh when the action gets a little too close for comfort. Spoiler alert: it’s Old Spice Total Body Deodorant, and it's rewriting the old playbook. Old Spice is bringing Kay, Flav, and Spice together on Up & Adams on FanDuel October 1

item.title: Assurant Celebrates the Grand Opening of its State-of-the-Art Innovation and Device Care Center in the Nashville Area

(NYSE: AIZ), a leading global business services company that supports, protects, and connects major consumer purchases, today officially opened its new Innovation and Device Care Center located just outside Nashville in Mt. Juliet, Tenn. item.title: Vast Unveils Its Final Haven-1 Space Station Design
item.description: LONG BEACH, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Vast, the US-based space habitation technology company pioneering the path to long-term living and thriving in space, today unveiled its interior design features aboard Haven-1, the world’s first commercial space station. item.title: VISIE™ Inc. Announces Continuous Anatomic Auto Tracking (CAAT) for Robotic-Assisted Total Knee Arthroplasty
item.description: AUSTIN, Texas--(BUSINESS WIRE)--VISIE Inc., formerly known as Advanced Scanners, announces it has successfully demonstrated Continuous Anatomic Auto Tracking (CAAT) for robotic-assisted total knee arthroplasty (RA-TKA) in its Austin, TX headquarters. Continuous Anatomic Auto Tracking (CAAT) CAAT is a proprietary, highly promising technological leap that gives the power of vision to surgical robotic and navigation systems designed for orthopedic, neuro, cranial, and spine surgery, including RA-T

item.title: Susan G. Komen® Shines Light on Breast Cancer’s Impact to Patients, Families Through New Videos of Resilience and Hope
item.description: DALLAS--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Susan G. Komen®, the world’s leading breast cancer organization, is marking National Breast Cancer Awareness Month by highlighting the profound and far-reaching toll breast cancer casts onto patients, family members and loved ones.
